location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘View of Pir Sultan Ziarat near Manzil’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:Black and white photograph showing a pile of branches, twigs and rocks on a sandy plain in the foreground, with sand dunes and hills in the background.Inscriptions:Upper right, above image, in pen: ‘No 5.’Left, alongside image, in pen: ‘Sand’, with an arrow pointing to the photographRight, alongside image, in pen: ‘Sand’, with an arrow pointing to the photographCentre, below image, in pen: ‘View of Pir Sultan Ziarat near Manzil’.
